body: Summer Day Camp         Day campers learn about soldiers' life during the Civil War. NPS photo  Summer Camp will not be offered in 2014. We look forward to it's return in future years and are sorry for the present inconvenience.   If you have questions please e-mail Brandon Chamberlain or call 434-352-8987 ext. 231 and leave a message, your call will be returned.
title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Summer Day Camp
